DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T2.stor_name AS stor_id, T1.ord_num, T1.ord_date, T1.qty, T1.payterms, T7.title AS title_id FROM pubs.dbo.sales T1 INNER JOIN pubs.dbo.stores T2 ON T1.stor_id = T2.stor_id INNER JOIN pubs.dbo.titles T7 ON T1.title_id = T7.title_id

field.name: *stor_id
field.lookup: SELECT stor_name,stor_id FROM pubs.dbo.stores ORDER BY stor_name

field.name: *title_id
field.lookup: SELECT title,title_id FROM pubs.dbo.titles ORDER BY title
